definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
lit. stale grain, overcooked sesame (idiom); fig. the same boring old gossip
pinyin: chen2 gu3 zi5 lan4 zhi1 ma5

sentences.english: The relatives of the millet is gone, the villagers from back home.
sentences.chinese: 亲戚的谷子没了，乡亲们再从家里背来。

sentences.english: Guiguzi or The Master of the Ghost Valley is a distinctive academic work of pre-Qin Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《鬼谷子》是先秦时期很有特色的一部学术著作。

sentences.english: I doubt if Flying Childers ever carried a peck of corn to mill.
sentences.chinese: 我怀疑飞童有没有载过一粒谷子到磨坊去。

sentences.english: I have sown the millet in this plot.
sentences.chinese: 我在这块土地上已播了谷子。

sentences.english: Eg: The farmer distributed the corn in the yard for the hens .
sentences.chinese: 那个农民把谷子撒在院子里喂鸡。

sentences.english: Haiti plane of millet, the first seed, and then planed.
sentences.chinese: 刨海地种谷子，先撒种，然后刨。

sentences.english: The 'rahm' was a kind of lumber-hole smelling strong of malt and grain;
sentences.chinese: 这屋子是个堆房之类，有一股强烈的麦子和谷子气味。

sentences.english: In 2004 it was released by National millet variety appraisal committee.
sentences.chinese: 2004年通过全国谷子品种鉴定委员会鉴定。

sentences.english: Also disease resistance were linked with grain colour of varieties.
sentences.chinese: 不同粒色的谷子品种其抗病性是不同的。

sentences.english: Bayi's hens always ate the poor people's millet.
sentences.chinese: 巴依的鸡专吃穷人的谷子。

sentences.english: The chickens will peck up all the grain that you throw on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 小鸡会把你扔在地上的谷子全鹐起来吃掉。

sentences.english: Sometimes they imitate a turtledove picking up grain.
sentences.chinese: 有时他们模拟“斑鸠吃谷子”等形象。

sentences.english: Famers scattered corns in the yard for the chickens.
sentences.chinese: 农民把谷子撒在院子里喂鸡。

sentences.english: The chicken will peck up all the grain that you throw on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 小鸡会把你扔在地上的谷子全部啄起来吃掉。

sentences.english: Like their ancestors, women winnow grain by hand near Lake Titicaca.
sentences.chinese: 和先辈一样，提提卡卡湖附近的女性还是用手扬谷子。

sentences.english: One day, the couple herded chicken onto the grain-sunning ground to eat others' grain.
sentences.chinese: 一天，老两口把鸡赶到晒谷场上偷吃别人谷子。

definition: variant of 包穀|包谷[bao1 gu3]
(dialect) maize/corn/also written 苞穀|苞谷[bao1 gu3]
Takahashi (name)/Takahashi city in Okayama prefecture, Japan/Highbridge (name)
